thread.title: Can AI Boost Accuracy of Doctors' Diagnoses?
thread.title_full: Can AI Boost Accuracy of Doctors' Diagnoses?

title: Can AI Boost Accuracy of Doctors' Diagnoses?
text:
Key Takeaways
Doctors don’t do better at diagnosing health problems with AI assistance
Diagnoses were about as accurate as they would be without AI
AI outperformed doctors when it diagnosed on its own, but it would fare less well in real-life scenarios, researchers said
